TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RenamedEventHandler(object sender, RenamedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed RenamedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub RenamedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RenamedEventArgs)
public delegate void RenamedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, RenamedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 類別的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立來監視檔案變更 FileSystemWatcher （建立、 刪除、 重新命名變更） 發生的磁碟機。The following example shows how to create a FileSystemWatcher to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive. 此範例也示範如何正確地接收錯誤通知。The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications. [!code-csharp[FileSystemWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemWatcher/cs/filesystemwatcher.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FileSystemWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemWatcher/VB/FileSystemWatcher.vb#1)]
